flow-definition.description: Smart job to rebuild any milestone/cron/regression pipeline based on provided parameters: scm owner

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ci_job_id
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Parent pipeline job id. All children job results will be analyzed and some of them re-executed.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: scm_url
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: [Optional] if provided then only jobs/suites which belong to this particular repo could be re-executed

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ci_user_id
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: [Optional] if provided then only jobs/suites which belong to this particular user could be re-executed

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: hashcode
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: [Optional] mostly for integration with Zafira Reporting Tool to be able to re-execute only jobs which tests failed due to the absolutely the SAME reason.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: cause
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: [Optional] mostly for integration with Zafira Reporting Tool to be able to re-execute only jobs which tests failed due to the SIMILAR reason.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: doRebuild
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Check it to do actual rebuild otherwise we will see in console log only number of suitable jobs for re-execution

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: rerunFailures
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Check to rebuild only failures otherwise all tests in job will be re-executed
